caption: A soul explores the ever-fresh mystery of prayer, finding new depths in familiar paths.
image_prompt: A stylized concept art illustration of a wise figure in a serene, luminous landscape, pausing on a well-worn path through a forest. The figure gazes upward, noticing light filtering through the branches in a new way after a rain, with the air sparkling and leaves glistening with droplets. The scene is rendered with deep perspective and spatial coherence, inspired by the atmospheric detail of Studio Ghibli, showing a clearly visible, anatomically correct face and hands with five distinct fingers, capturing a moment of contemplative discovery and grace.
